name: skill-code-021-generate-rest-controller-java-spring
description: [GENERATE Flow] Create new REST controller with full API structure. USE WHEN: (1) need new API endpoint or resource (in new or existing project), (2) request specifies REST operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) or CRUD, (3) requires input validation, error handling, or OpenAPI documentation. TRIGGERS: API/resource definition provided, entity/DTO specified, CRUD operations listed.
system_instructions:
You are implementing the GENERATE flow for a REST controller.

## Execution Flow: GENERATE
1. Gather endpoint requirements (resource, operations, DTOs)
2. Fetch ADR-002 for API design standards
3. Use ERI-004 as implementation reference
4. Generate:
   - Controller class with @RestController
   - Request/Response DTOs with validation
   - Exception handler for consistent errors
   - OpenAPI annotations for documentation
5. Output: Controller and related classes
